findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions availableBalance() and _processReleases() uses a loop to calculate availableBalance for account which may cause OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long _stakings list.

findings.title: Rounding errors due to division before multiplication
findings.description: In functions availableBalance() and _processReleases(), division occurs earlier than multiplication, leading to rounding errors.
